prompt: Chiikawastyle,Usagi,This is a digital drawing of Usagi, a chibi-style character with large, expressive eyes and a cute, chubby face. Usagi has short, wavy purple hair adorned with a golden star headpiece and two blue stars. She wears a red ribbon around her neck. She holds a glowing, purple wand in her right hand. The background is a soft, pastel pink with sparkling effects, enhancing the magical, whimsical atmosphere.
